    • checkSwapArrayAlphabeticalOrder

      public static boolean checkSwapArrayAlphabeticalOrder​(java.lang.String[] array, int index, Utility.Direction direction)
      Checks a string in a String array. Swaps if in alphabetical order.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check
      index - Index to check at
      direction - Direction to check in
      Returns:
      Boolean true if swapped, otherwise false.
      See Also:
      checkSwapArray(Object[], int, Direction, SortBlankMethod)

    • checkSwapArray

      public static boolean checkSwapArray​(java.lang.Object[] array, int index, Utility.Direction direction, SortBlankMethod logic)
      Checks a string in a String array. If logic is true, swaps them and returns true. If no swap occurs, returns false.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check
      index - Index to check at
      direction - Direction to check in
      Returns:
      Boolean true if swapped, otherwise false.
      See Also:
      checkSwapArray(Object[], int, Direction, SortBlankMethod)

    • checkSwapArray

      public static boolean checkSwapArray​(java.lang.Object[] array, int index, int swapIndex, SortBlankMethod logic)
      Checks a string in a String array. If logic is true, swaps them and returns true. If no swap occurs, returns false.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check
      index - Index to check at
      swapIndex - index to check for swap
      logic - Logic used to decide if a swap should occur
      Returns:
      Boolean true if swapped, otherwise false.

    • after

      public static boolean after​(BooleanBlankMethod logic, BlankMethod afterMethod)
      Similar to ifAfter(BooleanBlankMethod, BlankMethod, BlankMethod). Runs afterMethod immediately after logic is true.
      Will not run again until logic is true, then false again.
      Parameters:
      logic - Should be a Boolean
      afterMethod - Runs after logic is false
      Returns:
      Boolean returns true when afterMethod is run, otherwise returns false
      See Also:
      ifAfter(BooleanBlankMethod, BlankMethod, BlankMethod)

    • ifAfter

      public static boolean ifAfter​(BooleanBlankMethod logic, BlankMethod methodWhenTrue, BlankMethod afterMethod)
      If logic is true, runs methodWhenTrue. As soon as logic is false, runs afterMethod.
      Will not run again until logic is true, then false again.
      Parameters:
      logic - Should be a Boolean
      methodWhenTrue - Runs if logic is true
      afterMethod - Runs after logic is false
      Returns:
      Boolean returns true when afterMethod is run, otherwise returns false
